channel.title: CVE Feed for acymailing.com -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for acymailing.com -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-39974|2024-10-16T04:35:30.199Z -- acymailing.com -- acymailing%20enterprise%20component%20for%20joomla
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information vulnerability in AcyMailing Enterprise component for Joomla. It allows unauthorized actors to get the number of subscribers in a specific list.

item.title: CVE-2023-39973|2024-10-16T04:35:20.431Z -- acymailing.com -- acymailing%20enterprise%20component%20for%20joomla
item.description: Improper Access Control vulnerability in AcyMailing Enterprise component for Joomla. It allows the unauthorized removal of attachments from campaigns.

item.title: CVE-2023-39972|2024-10-16T04:35:00.125Z -- acymailing.com -- acymailing%20enterprise%20component%20for%20joomla
item.description: Improper Access Control vulnerability in AcyMailing Enterprise component for Joomla. It allows unauthorized users to create new mailing lists.

item.title: CVE-2023-39970|2024-10-16T04:34:45.166Z -- acymailing.com -- acymailing%20component%20for%20joomla
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in AcyMailing component for Joomla. It allows remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-39971|2024-10-16T04:34:37.526Z -- acymailing.com -- acymailing%20enterprise%20component%20for%20joomla
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation vulnerability in AcyMailing Enterprise component for Joomla allows XSS. This issue affects AcyMailing Enterprise component for Joomla: 6.7.0-8.6.3.
